text: (Napiyē!) Avarkaḷiṉ karaṅkaḷ tēṭikkoṇṭa (tīya) ceyaliṉ kāraṇamāka avarkaḷukku oru kaṣṭam ēṟpaṭṭa camayattil (ataṟkup parikāram tēṭikkoḷḷa muṭiyāmalākiviṭṭa avarkaḷiṉ iḻinilaimai) evvāṟu iruntatu (eṉpatai nīr kavaṉippīrāka)! Piṉṉar, avarkaḷ um'miṭamē vantu ‘‘(anta ṣaittāṉiṭam nāṅkaḷ ceṉṟatellām) naṉmaiyaiyum oṟṟumaiyaiyum virumpiyē tavira, vēṟoṉṟaiyum nāṅkaḷ virumpavillai'' eṉṟu allāhviṉ peyarāl cattiyam ceykiṉṟaṉar
